WorkItem.Description: Currently the assemblies available for download (v0.3) are not strongly signed, which means a manual code download and compilation with a key is needed to sign the assemblies so that they can be referenced by other strongly signed assemblies.
WorkItem.Summary: Provide signed assemblies out of the box

Comments.Message: Thanks for report. I will make sure there is an signed assembly on next release. For version 0.3 I will see what I can do with it.
